ul.li: Add the name of the App and View (filename of the dashboard without .xml ending)
To add a help text and a classification for a dashboard, just enter the view name in the panel field
Add the ID of the panel. Either set an unique ID in your dashboard manually, example: <panel id="your_custom_panel_id">... or use the HTML inspector to get the auto-generated ID
Choose a Classification. Normally this represents the criticality of the data shown in a panel
Specify for which version of the app this help entry is valid for. Add 'any' if the help entry should be available for all app versions

panel.title: Enable the Dashboard Assistant in your Apps
panel.html: Just add the following code to your SimpleXML dashboards: <dashboard script="dashboard_assistant:dashboard_assistant.js" stylesheet="dashboard_assistant:dashboard_assistant.css"> or for forms: <form script="dashboard_assistant:dashboard_assistant.js" stylesheet="dashboard_assistant:dashboard_assistant.css">
